  <meta name="robots" content="all" />
  <meta name="robots" content="index,follow"/>

          homePageName="">

  <script src="https://qzone.qq.com/gy/404/page.js" charset="utf-8"></script>
</body>
</html>

Post.title: Cocoapods Podfile
Post._content:
![top](/assets/blogImg/Cocoapods-Podfile-Arguments/cocoapods-top.jpg)

<!-- more -->

> [pluto-y](http://www.pluto-y.com/cocoapods-getting-stared/)

### Podfile

##### 1. pod '' 

- ****( `pod 'AFNetworking', '> 3.1'` )( `pod 'AFNetworking', '< 3.1'` )( `pod 'AFNetworking', '3.1'` )( `pod 'AFNetworking', '>= 3.1'` )**'~> 3.1' >=3.1 <3.2**
- ****Cocoapodsgit`:git => 'https://github.com/XXX/AFNetworking.git'``:path => '~/Documents/AFNetworking'`
- **tagbranchcommit**`:branch => 'branch'``:tag => 'tag'``:commit => ''`
- **inhibitallwarnings**warnings`:inhibitallwarnings => true`

##### 2. platform

 `platform :ios, '7.0'` iOS7.0

1. target

   **target**

2. use_frameworks!

   **swift**

3. source

   Cocoapods

#### Demo

```ruby
# open source
source 'https://github.com/CocoaPods/Specs.git'

# 
source 'https://github.com/Artsy/Specs.git'

#  iOS9.0 
platform :ios, '9.0'

target 'App' do
  
  # swift
  use_frameworks!
  
  pod 'AFNetworking'
  
  pod 'SVProgressHUD', '~>2.1' #2.12.2
  
  pod 'MJRefresh':git=> 'https://github.com/XXX/MJRefresh.git' # https://github.com/XXX/MJRefresh.git cocoapods
  
  pod 'Masonry', :git=> 'https://github.com/XXX/MJRefresh.git', :branch => '1-1-stable' #git repo branchcocoapod
  pod 'Masonry', :git=> 'https://github.com/XXX/MJRefresh.git', :tag => '1.3.0' #git repo tagcocoapod

  target 'AppTests' do
    
    # swift
    use_frameworks!
    
    pod 'FBSnapshotTestCase'
    
  end
end
```

###  `pod install`  `pod update`

1.  `--no-repo-update`

`pod install``pod update``pod repo update`

2. `verbose`  `--silent`

`pod``--silent``--verbose``Cocoapods`

### Ruby

1. Ruby

   `gem sources --remove https://rubygems.org/` 

2. Ruby China

   `gem sources -a https://gems.ruby-china.org/` 

3. Ruby

   `gem sources -l`

<!-- more -->

> [pluto-y](http://www.pluto-y.com/cocoapods-getting-stared/)

### Podfile

##### 1. pod '' 

- ****( `pod 'AFNetworking', '> 3.1'` )( `pod 'AFNetworking', '< 3.1'` )( `pod 'AFNetworking', '3.1'` )( `pod 'AFNetworking', '>= 3.1'` )**'~> 3.1' >=3.1 <3.2**
- ****Cocoapodsgit`:git => 'https://github.com/XXX/AFNetworking.git'``:path => '~/Documents/AFNetworking'`
- **tagbranchcommit**`:branch => 'branch'``:tag => 'tag'``:commit => ''`
- **inhibitallwarnings**warnings`:inhibitallwarnings => true`

##### 2. platform

 `platform :ios, '7.0'` iOS7.0

1. target

   **target**

2. use_frameworks!

   **swift**

3. source

   Cocoapods

#### Demo

```ruby
# open source
source 'https://github.com/CocoaPods/Specs.git'

# 
source 'https://github.com/Artsy/Specs.git'

#  iOS9.0 
platform :ios, '9.0'

target 'App' do
  
  # swift
  use_frameworks!
  
  pod 'AFNetworking'
  
  pod 'SVProgressHUD', '~>2.1' #2.12.2
  
  pod 'MJRefresh':git=> 'https://github.com/XXX/MJRefresh.git' # https://github.com/XXX/MJRefresh.git cocoapods
  
  pod 'Masonry', :git=> 'https://github.com/XXX/MJRefresh.git', :branch => '1-1-stable' #git repo branchcocoapod
  pod 'Masonry', :git=> 'https://github.com/XXX/MJRefresh.git', :tag => '1.3.0' #git repo tagcocoapod

  target 'AppTests' do
    
    # swift
    use_frameworks!
    
    pod 'FBSnapshotTestCase'
    
  end
end
```

###  `pod install`  `pod update`

1.  `--no-repo-update`

`pod install``pod update``pod repo update`

2. `verbose`  `--silent`

`pod``--silent``--verbose``Cocoapods`

### Ruby

1. Ruby

   `gem sources --remove https://rubygems.org/` 

2. Ruby China

   `gem sources -a https://gems.ruby-china.org/` 

3. Ruby

   `gem sources -l`

Post.title: Hexo (yilia)
Post._content:
![top](/assets/blogImg/Hexo-add-deciare/hexo-add-deciare-top.jpg) ### Step 1 `layout\_partial\post\` `declare.ejs` ```javascript <% if ((theme.declare_type === 2 || (theme.declare_type === 1 && post.declare)) && !index){ %>
<%= post.title %>
<%= theme.author%>
<%= page.date.format("YYYYMMDD - HH:MM")%>
<%= post.permalink %>
<%= theme.licensee_name%>
<% } %> ``` ### Step 2 `layout\_partial\article.ejs` ```javascript <%- partial('post/declare') %> ``` ### Step 3 `themes/yilia/source-src/css/declare.scss`CSS ```javascript .declare { background-color: #eaeaea; margin-top: 2em; border-left: 3px solid #ff1700; padding: .5em 1em; } ``` `themes/yilia/source-src/css/main.scss` ```javascript @import "./declare"; ``` ### Step 4 `themes/yilia/` `npm run dev` `npm run dist` > `yilia`copy`npm install webpack-cli -D``webpack``npm run dev``npm run dist``themes/yilia/source`hexoERROR ### Step 5 `themes/yilia/_config.yml` ```javascript #0- 1-mddeclare: true 2- declare_type: 2 licensee_url: https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-nd/4.0/ licensee_name: '-- 4.0 ' ``` ### End

Post.title: Hexo
Post._content:
### 

`hexo``git`

### 

[NexT](https://github.com/theme-next/hexo-theme-next)

```shell
$ git clone https://github.com/theme-next/hexo-theme-next themes/next
```

`thems/next/``.git/``push`Next

<!-- more -->

### 

[Issues](https://github.com/iissnan/hexo-theme-next/issues/328)`fork + subtree`

`fork` `Next``push``git subtree``themes/next/`

### 

- Hexo`BlogBackup`

- `themes`:

  ```shell
  $ git branch themes
  ```

  `themes`:

  ```shell
  $ git checkout themes
  ```

- `fork``next`

  ```shell
  $ git remote add -f next https://github.com/liuzhida33/hexo-theme-next.git
  ```

- `subtree`

  ```shell
  $ git subtree add --prefix=themes/next next master
  ```

  `fork``next``master``checkout``BlogBackup``themes`

- `themes`

  ```shell
  $ git checkout master 
  $ git merge themes --squash 
  $ git commit
  ```

### 

```shell
$ git subtree push --prefix=themes/next next master
```

`fork``next`

### 

```shell
git checkout themes 
git merge master 
git subtree pull --prefix=themes/next next master 
git checkout master 
git merge themes --squash 
git commit
```

Post.title: HTTPHTTPS
Post._content:
![top](/assets/blogImg/HTTP-and-HTTPS/http-https-top.jpg)

<!-- more -->

> **HTTPHyperText Transfer Protocol**HTML`80`
>
> **HTTPSHypertext Transfer Protocol Secure**HTTPSHTTPSSL/TLS`443`
>
> > [HTTP](https://zh.wikipedia.org/wiki/)[HTTPS](https://zh.wikipedia.org/wiki/)

### HTTP

##### 1. 

	HTTP80TCPHTTP"HTTP/1.1 200 OK"

##### 2. URL

> **URLUniform / Universal Resource Locator**Internet

****`scheme://host[:port#]/path//[?query-string][#anchor]`

- **scheme**(http, https, ftp)
- **host**IP
- **port**#80
- **path**
- **query-string**http
- **anchor**

##### 3. HTTP/1.1

1. **GET**URL
2. **HEAD**GET
3. **POST**POST/
4. **PUT**
5. **DELETE**
6. **CONNECT**HTTP/1.1
7. **OPTIONS**
8. **TRACE**

> `GET`Get

##### 4.

> HTTP****************

##### 1.Host

> **Host**URLWebInternetURL

##### 2.Connection ()

> **Connection**.

1. Client  `Connection:keep-alive` HTTP/1.1 `keep-alive` 
2. Server
   -  Server  `keep-alive` `Connection:keep-alive` 
   -  Server  `keep-alive` `Connection:close` 
3. client `Connection:keep-alive` 

> `keep-alive`(HTML)

##### 3.Upgrade-Insecure-Requests (HTTPS)

> **Upgrade-Insecure-Requests** http  https httpshttp

##### 4.User-Agent()

> **User-Agent**

##### 5.Accept

> **Accept**MIMEMultipurpose Internet Mail Extensions

- `Accept: \*/\*`
- `Accept: image/gif`GIF
- `Accept: text/html`html
- `Accept: text/html, application/xhtml+xml;q=0.9, image/*;q=0.8`MIMEhtmlxhtmlxml

> `q`0 =< q <= 1`q``;``q`10
>
> `Text`
>
> `Application`

##### 6.Referer

> **Referer**URL RefererWeb
